custom-sql.sql: SELECT DISTINCT event.* FROM gl_event event, gl_userandevent userandevent WHERE ( (userandevent.idEvent = event.idEvent AND userandevent.idUser = ? ) OR event.idAuthor = ? ) AND (event.plannedStartingTime BETWEEN ? AND ?)

SELECT event.* FROM gl_event event WHERE event.realStartingTime IS NULL AND event.realFinishTime IS NULL AND event.idAuthor != ? AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT uae.* FROM gl_userandevent uae WHERE uae.idEvent = event.idEvent AND uae.idUser = ?) AND (event.plannedStartingTime BETWEEN ? AND ?)

SELECT DISTINCT event.* FROM gl_event event, gl_userandevent userandevent WHERE userandevent.idEvent = event.idEvent AND (userandevent.idUser = ? OR event.idAuthor = ?) AND event.plannedStartingTime = ( SELECT MAX(event2.plannedStartingTime) FROM gl_event event2, gl_userandevent userandevent2 WHERE userandevent2.idEvent = event2.idEvent AND (userandevent2.idUser = ? OR event2.idAuthor = ?))

SELECT event.* FROM gl_event event WHERE event.realStartingTime IS NULL AND event.realFinishTime IS NULL AND event.idAuthor != ? AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT uae.* FROM gl_userandevent uae WHERE uae.idEvent = event.idEvent AND uae.idUser = ?) AND event.plannedStartingTime = ( SELECT MAX(event2.plannedStartingTime) FROM gl_event event2 WHERE event2.realStartingTime IS NULL AND event2.realFinishTime IS NULL AND event2.idAuthor != ? AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT uae2.* FROM gl_userandevent uae2 WHERE uae2.idEvent = event2.idEvent AND uae2.idUser = ?))
SELECT DISTINCT uae.* FROM gl_userandevent uae INNER JOIN gl_event event ON event.idEvent = uae.idEvent WHERE uae.idEvent = ? AND event.idAuthor != uae.idUser AND event.name LIKE ?
